desc: The act of going from one place to another.
example: She loves to travel and explore new countries.

desc: The business of providing services to travelers.
example: Tourism is an important industry in this region.

desc: A place where people stay when traveling.
example: We booked a hotel near the beach.

desc: A book with information for travelers.
example: The guidebook helped us find great places to eat.

desc: An arrangement to reserve a service, like a hotel or flight.
example: We made a booking online for our trip.

desc: The bags and suitcases you take on a trip.
example: He packed his luggage the night before the flight.

desc: An official document for international travel.
example: Don't forget your passport when going abroad.

desc: A place where planes take off and land.
example: We arrived at the airport two hours early.
The flight to Paris was delayed.

desc: A person who travels for pleasure.
example: The city was full of tourists during the summer.
